title: This game is excellent for killing procrastination.
body:
>Load up a game, get stuck with a Draven top who was autofilled in the position.
>Said draven main proceeds to rage and troll in chat, despite nobody saiyng a word to him.  "I MAEK U LOSE LALWALLOLOL", we all write it off as a toxic draven main who won't follow through
>First 2 minutes of the game, he purposely dives under turret despite having zero reason to do this, rages in all chat and quits
>Proceeds to make next 20+ Minutes a complete waste of everyone's time, while the remaining teammates proceed to troll and rage at each other.  
>I alt f4 to make more productive use of my time.

Thank you, disgusting draven main.

https://s28.postimg.org/63b8cp4wt/bdxud_TZ.jpg
